column4: -.- is there anyone that can give me help on this i can't do jack shit on my computer until i'm helped
Hey can anyone here help me i have a bunch of problems with ubuntu
Hey can anyone here help me? I have a bunch of problems with ubuntu >>
well theres like 5 and their complicated
well let's start with the first one then :)
what error does it give you?
you can install software over system->administration->synaptic package manager
at least we know that sudo works :)
scroll down the page to the list of repositories for  "debian-based linux distributions"
my idea would be to add one of the virtualbox repositories to your repository list (/etc/apt/sources.list) and then try to remove virtualbox

navigate in your file browser to /etc/apt and then click on sources.list. enter your password. add the correct line for your system from the list of repositories on http://www.virtualbox.org/wiki/Downloads (probably deb http://www.virtualbox.org/debian edgy non-free) and save
have you entered the name of the repository correctly?
